text: Ana higeno Josua'a ana mopafima me'nea rankuma'tamina hara hu zamagaterevaga nereno, agonaregama me'nea kumatamine, kini zamine, Nigevi kazigama me'nea kumatamine, kini zamine, zage fre kaziga me'nea agonaramimofo agiafi me'nea kumatamine kini zamine, Jodani agupofima nemaniza vahe'ene kini zamia, Ra Anumzama Israeli vahe'mokizmi Anumzamo'ma huo huno'ma hunte'nea kante anteno, Josua'a magore huno ozamatreno, ana maka zamahe fri vagare'ne.
